bibl.title: Tell el-Yahudia: New Information from Unpublished Excavations.
bibl.note: Brief report about excavations conducted by Ahmed Abd el Fatah in 1981-1982. A large cemetery which dates back in part to the Graeco-Roman period was uncovered.
bibl.seg: Aiman Ashmawy Ali, Tell el-Yahudia: New Information from Unpublished Excavations.
Ägypten und Levante 20 (2010) pp. 31-41, 16 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Brief report about excavations conducted by Ahmed Abd el Fatah in 1981-1982. A large cemetery which dates back in part to the Graeco-Roman period was uncovered.
